author: sky.cactus
content: The best place for a more permanent discussion would be the discussions-to link for the EIP.

author: sky.cactus
content: If you want an informal discussion, https://discord.gg/FNS6JztT is probably a better choice.

author: timhc22
content: (happy to jump into cat Herders and ask there if better)

author: sky.cactus
content: That link is the approximate place to ask questions.  It is worth noting that it is unfortunately not uncommon for an EIP author to disappear.  If that is the case here and you are passionate about moving a a standard like this forward, then your best option is to create a new EIP with yourself as the author.

author: sky.cactus
content: You may want to try mentioning the authors in that comment first though, just in case they have not subscribed to the issue discussion.
